clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of LightSheer Duet 805nm HS Handpiece
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Evaluation of LightSheer Duet 805nm HS Handpiece

brief_summary.textblock:
- The study will re-confirm that the LightSheer Duet HS 805 nm handpiece is safe for removal of unwanted hair, and will result in hair removal and permanent hair count reduction.
- Twenty (20)subjects, Fitzpatrick Skin Type I-IV will be included in a single site.
- Each subject will receive five treatments at four to six week intervals and return for follow-up visits at three and six months after the last treatment for evaluation of the treated areas.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with Adverse Events
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of hair removal using the LightSheer Duet HS 805 nm handpiece
To verify hair removal and permanent hair reduction using the LightSheer Duet HS 805 nm handpiece

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate subject's assessment of comfort associated with treatments

secondary_outcome.measure: Asses subject's perception of improvement and satisfaction
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 8, 16 weeks following baseline; 3 and 6 monts follow up
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate subject's satisfaction with hair removal treatments and assessment of improvement using subject's questionnaire

arm_group.description: hair removal treatment using 805nm LightSheer Duet HS handpiece

intervention.description: The approach to be studied here relies on a cleared modality, the LightSheer Duet High Speed (HS) that uses 805 nm diode laser with vacuum (K053628).
